metadata.title: CVE-2019-20797 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in e6y prboom-plus 2.5.1.5. There is a bufferoverflow in client and server code responsible for handling received UDPpackets, as demonstrated by I_SendPacket or I_SendPacketTo in i_network.c.

criterions.comment: prboom-plus package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
